DataElement.preferredName: Modified Physical Activity Minutes Per Time  Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number value to represent the number of minutes spent on a specified activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Review of changes or modification in physical activities of an individual.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Modified; changed in form or character.:Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Concepts.definition: Modified; changed in form or character.

Any form of exercise or movement. Physical activity may include planned activity such as walking, running, basketball, or other sports. Physical activity may also include other daily activities such as household chores, yard work, walking the dog, etc. (from NIDDK Glossary; http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health/nutrit/pubs/glossary/glossaryintro.htm)

Property.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from retired to released to support C3D CDEs. mc 11/8/19

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Number value to represent the number of minutes spent on a specified activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: How much time in total did you usually spend on one of those days doing vigorous physical activities?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: How much time in total did you usually spend on one of those days doing moderate physical activities?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: How much time in total did you usually spend walking on one of those days?
